text_block_list.text:
It's almost time for the URA awards ceremony, and I'm waiting for the 
broadcast of my mentor's big moment.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock! You in here, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there you are! Got a minute? I wanted to talk to you about the 
Derby exhibit.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was thinking about the stuff we'll show. But, like… I wanna make 
things easier to understand.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right now it's kinda just a spread of information. But what I really want is for people to be floored by what they see!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I thought maybe you'd have a good idea. Thinking up ideas isn't 
really my thing, hehe…

Something flooring, huh? How about you go into detail on what you 
feel most passionately about?

Something flooring, huh? How about you go into detail on what you 
feel most passionately about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What I feel most passionately about?

Whenever you talk about the Derby, you always tell me what each 
runner was thinking and feeling, right?

Whenever you talk about the Derby, you always tell me what each 
runner was thinking and feeling, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, I get it! So I should show the stuff that has all the juicy lore!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I've already got some other items I put together that might work! All 
right, time to make a sweet exhibit!

Winning Ticket wants to start organizing the displays, but the 
broadcast is about to begin.

Before that, mind if I watch something on TV? My mentor's receiving 
a URA award.

Before that, mind if I watch something on TV? My mentor's receiving 
a URA award.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Oguri's trainer, right? I'll watch too! This should be good!

I turn the TV on, and in a few moments, the ceremony I've been 
anticipating begins.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations on your URA award! In your long years of training, is 
there a race that stands out above the rest?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Well, I feel strongly about all the runners I've worked with. So each 
race has a special place in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
This award commemorates all your amazing achievements. How did 
you feel when you heard you'd be receiving it?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I was so happy. I couldn't believe it… I wondered how I could 
deserve it.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Not every racer's dreams came true. I was never able to lead one of 
my own to victory in the Derby, after all.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I sure wanted it though, same as anyone involved in racing. They say 
a Derby win's the greatest honor one can achieve.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? So he never won the Derby…

I didn't realize until now, but of all the big titles he attained, not one 
was the Derby.

I always hear that it's the pinnacle of racing, but not even a veteran 
trainer like him could win it.

I always hear that it's the pinnacle of racing, but not even a veteran 
trainer like him could win it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You know, the Derby was the very first big race of the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ever since it began, lots of dramas have been made about the 
amazing racers who've tried so hard to win it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And everyone's super-duper serious about it! That's why it's a huge 
challenge for even a veteran trainer and the most skilled racers to 
win.

The fact that even my old mentor couldn't win it convinces me of 
Winning Ticket's point.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
You even participated in a Derby once where your runner was the 
favorite to win, but in the end, she didn't manage to clinch victory, 
right?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I remember it well. I trained her until she was all but assured of 
victory. Even so, her rivals gave her the slip in the final stretch.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Some people said if only we'd done this or that, we would've come 
out on top. But she'd given it everything she had—I knew I couldn't 
let myself think like them.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I told her not to regret a thing—just remember that she put her whole 
heart into it. Learn and push forward… That's what I realized we 
needed to do in the end.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
They're talking about the first Derby I ever saw! I watched it right at 
the track with my mom!
You were at the Derby he's talking about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm sure of it! It was an absolutely amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Even though his racer was the favorite, she fell behind. But she was so 
focused on winning that she never gave up, even until the very end!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I finally understood how precious the Derby is after seeing that. 
That's why I fell in love with it.

Winning Ticket is enthralled with the Derby. It all stems from her 
seeing it once as a kid, and that was the very Derby my mentor and 
his trainee fought so hard in.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I ended up retiring before I could ever win it… Now a member of 
Team Sirius carries on the dream though.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text: I truly believe that trainer can finally grab the title.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, that's about you, right? He said you can win it!
Yeah…
Yeah…

It feels like my old teacher can see me from the other side of the TV. 
Like he's saying, "Here's the dream. You've got this, kid."

It feels like my old teacher can see me from the other side of the TV. 
Like he's saying, "Here's the dream. You've got this, kid."

A dream yet unfulfilled… It dawns on me that I've been given 
something very precious. My mentor really believes in me…
choice_data_list: It would be nice to win the Derby…

text_block_list.text:
A dream yet unfulfilled… It dawns on me that I've been given 
something very precious. My mentor really believes in me…
choice_data_list: It would be nice to win the Derby…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wha?! So you're gonna go after it?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: WAAAH! Now that's a story! A master who passes on the dream he couldn't achieve to his pupil!
Like she says, the whole thing does feel like a story.

Right when I'm asked to help with an exhibit, I end up meeting 
someone whose dream is winning the Derby.

And right when Winning Ticket comes to the trainers' office, we hear 
my mentor talk about it. It's all connected…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The announcer's pretty good at interviewing too! I'm blown away that I got to hear this Derby story!
Could this be fate? It certainly feels like it.
choice_data_list: Hey, how about we go for it together?
Hey, how about we go for it together?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? By "it," you mean…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: W-wait… Go for the Derby? W-w-with me?!
Yeah, you want to win the Derby, right?
Yeah, you want to win the Derby, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Darn right I do! I've gotta win it! That's been my dream since I was 
little!
Well, now I feel like I've got to win it too.
Well, now I feel like I've got to win it too.
So if you're up for it, let's go for it together.
So if you're up for it, let's go for it together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: For… for real? You sure you wanna partner up with me?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah… Uwaaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
WOOHOOOOO! I GOT SCOUTED! Let's do it, Trainer! Let's win the 
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I'm gonna earn you the title of "Derby trainer"!

All right. And I'm going to help you earn the title of "Derby 
champion."

All right. And I'm going to help you earn the title of "Derby 
champion."

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sweet! I'm super stoked to be working with you! All riiight! Let's go for 
the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm Winning Ticket. Pleasure to meet you!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wow, someone with some real pep joined the gang.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I've heard much about you, Ticket. Your goal is to win the Derby, 
yes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A great many racers share that goal. You'll have plenty of rivals, but 
we'll help you pursue this dream together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I promise to get Team Sirius a Derby victory!

Ticket's drive for the Derby is the real deal. I'm counting on you all to 
give her your full support!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoa, right on! Let's move out, newbie! The sun shines on us today!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Here we come, DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's the spirit! I'm right there with ya! To the DEEERBYYY!

And so the curtains rise on the story of Winning Ticket and her pursuit 
of victory at the Japanese Derby.
